options.label: How do I know I exist?
How do I know I exist?

value.name: show_meta_icon
value.label: Show Meta Icons
value.help: Icons for metadata such as - date, category, user etc

value.name: show_icon
value.label: Show icon
value.help: Icon will visible left to the title

schema.name: show_meta_icon
schema.label: Show Meta Icons
schema.help: Icons for metadata such as - date, category, user etc

schema.name: show_icon
schema.label: Show icon
schema.help: Icon will visible left to the title

value.name: sticky_animation
value.label: Sticky Animation
value.help: Add an animation in order to have the sticky element reappear smoothly.

value.name: sticky_bottom
value.label: Sticky Bottom
value.help: Bind the sticky behavior to a specific element, so that it disappears after scrolling past that point of the page.

value.name: sticky_show_on_up
value.label: Sticky on scroll up
value.help: You can make the sticky element show only when scrolling up to save space. Together with an animation, this makes for a very smooth experience.

value.name: sticky_media
value.label: Responsive
value.help: The element will be sticky from the specified viewport width and upwards, but not below. Only numbers allowed.

value.name: sticky_offset
value.label: Offset
value.help: You can position the element below the viewport edge.

schema.name: sticky_animation
schema.label: Sticky Animation
schema.help: Add an animation in order to have the sticky element reappear smoothly.

schema.name: sticky_bottom
schema.label: Sticky Bottom
schema.help: Bind the sticky behavior to a specific element, so that it disappears after scrolling past that point of the page.

schema.name: sticky_show_on_up
schema.label: Sticky on scroll up
schema.help: You can make the sticky element show only when scrolling up to save space. Together with an animation, this makes for a very smooth experience.

schema.name: sticky_media
schema.label: Responsive
schema.help: The element will be sticky from the specified viewport width and upwards, but not below. Only numbers allowed.

schema.name: sticky_offset

value.name: animation_repeat
value.label: Animation Repeat
value.help: Applies animation every time the element is in view

schema.name: animation_repeat
schema.label: Animation Repeat
schema.help: Applies animation every time the element is in view

value.name: id
value.label: Css ID
value.help: Add your custom ID WITHOUT the '#'. eg - my-id

value.name: class
value.label: Css Class
value.help: Add your custom classes WITHOUT the dot and seperate by space. eg - first-class another-class
